newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla fed cattle trade slow at $69 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla fed cattle trade slow at $69 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow in the Panhandle area early Thursday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers steady. Feedlots reporting moderate inquiry from buyers.

Sales reported on 4,300 slaughter steers and 200 heifers; 85,500 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 14,400 formulated cattle and 1,900 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Note - all live cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1250 lbs 69.00.
Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs 69.00. Confirmed - 4,500
